<title level="1" right="Trait">[Rakshasa](/Traits.aspx?ID=233)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 347</row>

Reincarnations of evil souls, rakshasas are fiends that live on the Material Plane.
